      • getLongInfo

        public String getLongInfo​(CalibrePlugin plugin,
                          org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender)
        Gets lines of info used by other objects in /calibre info. The string is split by \n to create the line separations. Can be null.
        Parameters:
        plugin - The CalibrePlugin used for text generation.
        sender - The command's sender.
        Returns:
        The info.
